original: Bergström, Axel Uno, fältveterinär, Skövde, f. 31/5/97 i Finshyttan, Värml. 1., av ling. Alfred B. o. Anina Vilhelmina Jansson. G. 23 m. Margit Husberg. Barn: Nils-Olof f. 24. — Studrex. v. Lundsbengs ’sk. 15, vet:-kand. 17, vet:ex. 20. Aman. v. med. Min. 18-19, tjg. distr :vet. 20-21, bat:-vet. v. Livreg. hus. 21, tf. dito v. Göta trängkår 26-27, bativet. där 28, kaptens tj :ställn. 31, majors tj rställn. 40, fältvet. v. Fvk. samt mil :bef :vet. v. VL milo 42-45, d:o v. Hl. milo sed. 46, överstelöjtn. tj :ställn. 43. Förest. f. Skövde stads köttbesiktn :byrå o., matvarukontroll 26-42, verkst. dir. i Billingens Trafik A-B 30. RVO, Sv-BSftjtS, Skarab. Skytteförb. ftjtG, K-FinlLO, FinlM f. humandtär verksamhet, Arméns SkytteM.
translated: Bergström, Axel Uno, Field Veterinarian, Skövde, born May 31st, 1897 in Finshyttan, Värmland, first child of linguist Alfred B. and Anina Vilhelmina Jansson. Married in 1923 to Margit Husberg. Children: Nils-Olof, born in 1924. Studied at Lundsbengs school, graduated in 1915. Completed veterinary studies in 1920. Worked as a medical assistant in 1918-1919, served as district veterinarian in 1920-1921, worked as a battalion veterinarian in Livreg. hus in 1921, served as acting battalion veterinarian in Göta trängkår in 1926-1927, worked as a battalion veterinarian there in 1928. Was appointed as captain in 1931 and major in 1940. Worked as field veterinarian for Fvk. and military veterinary officer for VL milo in 1942-1945 and continued in the same position for Hl. milo from 1946. Appointed as lieutenant colonel in 1943. Served as head of Skövde city's meat inspection bureau and food control from 1926-1942, and as managing director of Billingens Trafik A-B from 1930. Was awarded RVO, Sv-BSftjtS, Skarab. Skytteförb. ftjtG, K-FinlLO, and FinlM, for humanitarian work and Arméns SkytteM.
